text: "ENKEI TS-5 Black, black shiny rims on my sedan, just perfection! I recommend this to anybody who wants to make it car more beautiful."
name: Jay Mafield

text: "KANSEI ASTRO Hypersilver, this rim is made for every hot hatch out there on the streets. I love it!"
name: Fredrick Bottas

text: "F1R F29 Gold rims, perfect for any Subar out there on the market. Costs around 900$, great for every build!"
name: Kjoto Yokohama
